Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟，透過課程專題製作，學者將學習以 UML 記載分析與設計之結果，並使用一個物件導向語言 (如 Java 或 C++) 實作之。課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML 介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析，使用個案，觀念模型，有限狀態模型  3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案，合作圖，類別圖，設計模板，3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對  4. 專題
description.en: This course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML  2. Object-oriented languages and environments  3. Object-oriented software development process 3.1 Object-oriented analysis - requirement analysis, use case analysis, conceptual models, finite state machine models 3.2 Object-oriented design - real use cases, collaboration diagrams, class design diagrams, design patterns 3.3 Construction - mapping design to codes 4. Term project.

notes: 資工四。資工所。鐵道班合開，兼任週四 346

description.zh: 使學生熟悉計算機圖的基本原理、方法、及工具，內容包括： （１）二維及三維幾何圖形之產生 （２）二維及三維何圖形之轉換 （３）隱藏面及隱藏線之處理（４）色彩原理 （５）光影及暗影技術 學生將需撰寫電腦程式或使用幾何算圖程式
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with basic principles, methods, and tools of computer graphics. Topics include: 1.Generation of 2D and 3D geometric shapes 2.2D and 3D transformation 3.Hidden surfaces and hidden lines techniques 4.Color principles 5.Shading and shadowing techniques. The student will be required to write computer programs and/or use modeling and rendering packages

notes: 資工四。資工所。創新 AI 班合開

description.zh: 1. 單元測試 2. 互動測試 3. 整合測試 4. 分析與設計模型測試 5. 功能測試 6. 圖形介面測試 7. 系統測試
description.en: 1.Unit testing 2.Interactin testing 3.Integration testing 4.Analysis and design model testing 5.Functional testing 6.GUI Testing 7.System testing

notes: 英語授課，資工所和創新資安班合開

description.zh: 1. 軟體架構總覽 2.Client-server 式架構 3.Model-view-controller 式架構 4.n 層式架構 5.Peer-to-peer 式架構 6. 式樣導向式架構 7.Pipes and filter 式架構特論
description.en: 1.Software architecture-overview 2.Client-Server 3.Model-view-controller 4.n-Tier design 5.Peer-to-peer 6.Pattern-oriented software architecture 7.Special Topics:pipes and filter

description.zh: 本課程旨在教授學生瞭解雲端環境及物聯網系統架構並進一步教授雲端環境及物聯網安全需求，課程內容除介紹雲端環境及物聯網系統的基本概念外，亦將由 OWASP 的雲端安全及物聯網安全重點進行說明，培養學生有能力分析雲端及物聯網環境中的各式潛在安全威脅，並具備設計與實作具安全防護能力的雲端及物聯網系統。課程內容包含：●雲服務技術簡介●雲服務安全●雲服務資安標準●物聯網技術簡介●工業物聯網潛在威脅●工控資安●物聯網資安檢測●物聯網資安標準●資安安全與隱私保護
description.en: This course aims to guide students understanding cloud environments and IoT systems and their corresponding security requirements. In addition to introducing basic concepts of cloud environment and IoT system, the course contents will focus on OWASP's cloud security and IoT security. All practical techniques will be explained. Students are able to analyze various potential security threats in the cloud and Internet of Things environments, and to learn security protection capabilities for cloud and IoT systems. Course contents including:●	Introduction to cloud technologies●	Introduction to cloud security●	Security standards for cloud services ●	Introduction to IoT technologies●	Potential threats of industrial IoT systems●	Industrial Cyber Security introduction●	IoT security detection●	IoT security standards●	Information security and privacy protection

notes: 資工四。資工所。電資外生所和創新資安班合開

description.zh: 區塊鏈技術 (作為比特幣等數位貨幣的核心) 已重塑了金融交易與分散式交互方式之未來。同時它也被期待帶給我們一個更自組與可提供事實證明的數位化世界。抽象化區塊鏈構造是非常精巧的，它倚賴輕量化密碼學工具搭配分散式系統概念，完成了開放、安全且有效率的系統 (如比特幣)。本課程為區塊鏈技術與應用上之概念介紹，包含：比特幣與區塊鏈設計、相關基礎密碼學工具、分散式網路與共識、區塊鏈應用。
description.en: Blockchain techniques (the core of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin) have reshaped the future of financial transactions and decentralized interactions. They are also expected to bring us a more self-organizing and dependent digital world. The abstraction of blockchain is very delicate. It relies on cryptography tools and decentralized system concepts to achieve an open, secure, and efficient system (such as Bitcoin). This course aims to introduce the concepts of blockchain techniques and applications, including Bitcoin and blockchain design, basic cryptography tools, decentralized networks and consensus, and blockchain applications.

notes: 資工四。資工所和創新資安班合開

description.zh: 自主移動式機器人課程提供近年來在移動機器人的研究概況，以及相關的技術開發。本課程將將說明近三十年來領域發展歷史，讓同學了解包括機器人運動學、感測技術、定位與導航技術，以及實際應用的各項近期的進展。
description.en: Autonomous Mobile Robots presents an overview of technologies and methods for mobile robotics research. The specific goals of this course follow: 1. To provide historical context about mobile robotics, primarily over the past 30 years. 2. To enable students to study a chosen, specific mobile robotic technology. 3. To study state-of-the-art mobile robot research in detail.

notes: 資工所。電資外生。創新 AI 班合開

description.zh: 實現計算已從傳統地本地端機器獨立完成，進而委託上雲端等服務提供者協力完成。然而隨著資料或應用的授權，相關的計算安全性必須重新被探討。本課程將會從資料的隱密性出發，探討如何使用同態加密法輕鬆完成一個安全的授權計算，進而利用其他輕量化元件 (混淆電路、私密分享) 來取代同態加密並重新設計授權計算協定。接著會轉往定義資料的隱私性，並介紹 k 匿名等去識別化技術，最終帶入現今最嚴謹的差分隱私。透過上述之保有隱私與安全方法，將著名的人工智慧與機器學習演算法導入授權計算之中，重構不同情境的新型態安全計算框架。
description.en: The implementation of computation has been completed independently from the local machine, and then outsourced to the cloud (or some service providers) to complete it. However, with the delegation of data or applications, accordingly the security of such computation must be revisited. This course will start from the data confidentiality, discuss how to use homomorphic encryption to easily complete a secure outsourced computation, and then use other lightweight components (garbled circuit, secret sharing) to replace homomorphic encryption and redesign the secure protocols. Then it will move to define the privacy of data, introduce de-identification techniques such as k-anonymity, and finally bring the most rigorous notion of differential privacy. Through the above-mentioned methods of preserving privacy and security, artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms are introduced into the outsourced computation to reconstruct a new type of the framework for different scenarios.

notes: 二教 103, 資工所。電資外生所和創新資安班合開

description.zh: 資料科學是個跨領域的重要興新學科，其基本知識含括資訊、線性代數、機率與統計等，相關技術可應用在許多領域上，包含教育領域。本課程從學科整體介紹開始，討論資料科學中各主要階段的相關議題：包含資料搜尋擷取、資料整理與問題發想、數理知識回顧與討論、資料分析建模與方法、資料呈現與視覺化等。除課堂上講授與討論外，課程亦著重如何實際應用所學，將使用教育資料並以小組方式進行議題發想與分析實作的學期專題。此外，為強化健全資料視覺呈現課題，在實作專題中課程亦著重學生報告能力的培養，希望培育出全方位的資料科學人才。
description.en: Data science is an emerging interdisciplinary field that explores how to produce the valuable knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to many applications, including education. The topics include data processing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and data analysis. The course introduces the rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with fundamental related knowledge and the ability to use software tools. The major phases on data manipulation-collection, preparation, analytics, and presentation, in data science will be discussed. The course training is toward equipping students with the mindset and the ability to solve problems with the learned techniques on educational data. In addition, students need to practice the presentation for the findings of the studied problem in order to equip with the ability to convey the thoughts well and demonstrate things visually.

name.zh: 資料科學原理與教育數據應用
name.en: Data Science Principles with Applications on Educational Data

description.zh: 安全程式設計是資訊安全領域中的關鍵技術。不良的「程式設計習慣」和「不考慮安全保護的程式設計」很容易導致可有心人士所利用。本課程除了建立安全程式設計的基礎知識外，特別著重於同學的實務能力、漏洞測試、與安全程式開發能力。同時，透過分享最新的論文研究與相關技術報告，協助研究生在研究階段獲取最新的領域知識。
description.en: Security programming is a key technology in the field of information security. “Bad programming habits” and “programming without security consideration” can easily lead to the use of malicious people. Four major themes will be explored.In addition to establishing the basic knowledge of security programming, this course focuses on student's practical ability, vulnerability testing, and security programming development ability. At the same time, by sharing novel research papers and related technical reports, the students can obtain the newest and complete domain knowledge in their research stage.

notes: 資工所和創新資安班合開

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 在各指導教授的指導下，從事環境規劃與管理等相關領域的論文寫作，其宜包括研究方法或實驗方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。
description.en: A thesis of Ms. Degree should be proposed by all students associated with the agreement of their instructor professor. The thesis focuses on the fields in "Environmental Planning and Management", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源 (如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源 (如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等) 及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 探討非均相觸媒應用於環境領域中之反應原理、反應動力學並進一步分析觸媒製造技術。
description.en: This course will involve mainly the theories, characterization techniques and applications of HETEROGENEOUS CATALYSIS in Environmental Science field..

description.zh: 氣候變遷儼然已為全球邁入 21 世紀所面對最嚴峻國際環保課題，對非聯合國氣候變化綱要公約締約國及屬於外銷型新興工業國家的台灣，正處在發展轉捩點上，為維持國家競爭力，國內應擬訂更積極之節能減碳政策，並著手研擬調適衝擊方案，同時加強與國際間合作，進行減碳政策、技術與經驗交流，以推動碳市場之國際接軌，並確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展。本課程將介紹溫室氣體與氣候變遷之關連性、國際溫室氣體管制相關公約、我國溫室氣體管理現況、溫室氣體減量政策與經濟工具、及溫室氣體衝擊調適與節能新技術等，期藉由本課程使之瞭解全球暖化成因與後果與國內外溫室氣體管理現況與法規要求，以提升我國於氣候變遷因應之認知。
description.en: This class introduces scientific, economic, and ecological issues about the threat of global climate change, and the Policy Instruments of greenhouse gas management.  This course examines the interconnections of international politics and climate change.  It includes Green House Gas inventory, carbon tax and emission trading, Voluntary approach and other greenhouse gas management policy tools.  It explores an integrated approach to analysis the benefits of greenhouse gas and air pollution reduction measures, and related model development.

name.en: Green House Gas Management and Practice
